seo_relevant_changes.detail: 4 content hub landing pages added: /ai/, /marketing/, /seo-insights/, /industry-news/ -- each with dynamic [slug] article routes

20 new professional blog posts added to src/lib/blog.ts with category system (ai, marketing, seo, news). New posts include: chatgpt-ads-launch, google-universal-commerce-protocol, meta-andromeda-algorithm, tiktok-us-deal, google-ai-overviews-ads, google-february-2026-core-update, the-real-cost-of-vanity-metrics, ai-overviews-zero-click-seo, core-web-vitals-inp, eeat-seo-strategy, internal-linking-architecture, llm-visibility-ai-search, first-party-data-strategy, employee-advocacy-b2b, account-based-experience-abx, ai-marketing-automation-90-day, ai-roi-reckoning-2026, agentic-ai-enterprise-2026, ai-compliance-tsunami-2026, multimodal-ai-marketing-2026

Sitemap massively expanded from ~20 URLs to ~100+ URLs. All content hub landing pages and their article routes added. All blog posts now have entries. Content hub articles are duplicated across /blog/[slug] and /[hub]/[slug] paths (potential duplicate content issue).
Root layout.tsx: Google Search Console verification tag added (c9auD4d1EqN--1_vKGCVADAt-HXid2ua0LFJYTd7O70). Favicon paths fixed from /bknd-website/ prefix to root /. OG image paths fixed similarly.
robots.txt updated: Sitemap URL changed from GitHub Pages (charwinvanryckdegroot.github.io/bknd-website/sitemap.xml) to production domain (bknddevelopment.com/sitemap.xml). Base URL comment updated.

Massive code reformatting across all existing files -- single quotes to double quotes, consistent line wrapping. 70 files affected, ~17,800 insertions / ~3,800 deletions. Most are formatting-only, no SEO content impact.
Blog post data model updated: BlogCategory type added (ai, marketing, seo, news). All existing blog posts now have category assignments. New blog layout.tsx added.
New components: ArticleGrid.tsx (for content hub article listings), HubHero.tsx (for content hub hero sections)
basePath made conditional (Vercel vs GitHub Pages). Package renamed from singlegrain-site to bknd-development. next.config.ts updated.

potential_issues: Blog posts appear under both /blog/[slug] AND /[hub]/[slug] paths in sitemap -- this creates duplicate URLs for the same content and may cause duplicate content issues with Google
All lastmod dates set to 2026-02-04 uniformly, not reflecting actual per-page modification dates
No canonical tags observed in content hub article pages to resolve /blog/ vs /hub/ duplicate paths

summary: Major content expansion since last SEO run on Feb 2. Three commits landed: (1) 20 new professional blog posts with a category system across 4 content hubs (AI, Marketing, SEO Insights, Industry News), (2) code reformatting across all files, and (3) sitemap update. New pages include 4 content hub landing pages with dynamic article routes, 2 new AI service pages (GEO, Automation), and an AI methodology page. The sitemap expanded from ~20 to ~97 URLs. Key SEO concern: blog posts are duplicated across /blog/[slug] and /[hub]/[slug] paths in the sitemap without apparent canonical resolution, which could cause duplicate content indexing issues. Google Search Console verification was added. robots.txt and favicon/OG image paths were corrected for the production domain.
